Actions.Name: Enfeeble
Actions.Hit: [D]+[fray] and character must save or be pacified.

Actions.Name: World Revolving
Actions.Description: Shove all foes on the battlefield 1 spaces in the same direction.
Actions.Collide: Foe takes [D]+[fray] damage and is branded.

Actions.Name: Balance Scales
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 must save or take Divine damage equal to 25% of their hp, or 1 divine damage on a successful save. An ally in range 6 gains vigor 1.
